mapper.sql: user_dm, xm, zw, mobile, dept_dm, qybj, czrq, xgrq, dl_mm
mapper.insert: insert into dm_cs_user (xm, zw, mobile, dept_dm, qybj, czrq, xgrq, dl_mm) values (#{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qybj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dlMm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into dm_cs_user
xm,
zw,
mobile,
dept_dm,
qybj,
czrq,
xgrq,
dl_mm,
#{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deptDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{qybj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{dlMm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update dm_cs_user
xm = #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zw = #{zw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_dm = #{deptDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qybj = #{qybj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
czrq = #{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
xgrq = #{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dl_mm = #{dlMm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_dm = #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dm_cs_user set xm = #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zw = #{zw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_dm = #{deptDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qybj = #{qybj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, czrq = #{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, xgrq = #{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dl_mm = #{dlMm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_dm = #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from dm_cs_user where qybj = 1 and mobile = #{mobile}
select gwjs_dm from dm_cs_user u inner join dm_wf_rygwdzb r where r.user_dm = u.user_dm and u.mobile = #{mobile}
select dept_dm from dm_cs_user where user_dm = #{userId} and qybj = 1
select ding_userid from dm_cs_user where dept_dm = #{deptId} and qybj = 1
select xm from dm_cs_user where ding_userid = #{staffId} and qybj = 1
select user_dm from dm_cs_user where ding_userid = #{staffId} and qybj = 1
select * from dm_cs_user where dept_dm = #{deptId} and qybj = 1
select xm from dm_cs_user where user_dm = #{userId} and qybj = 1
